import React, { Component } from 'react' import { DataContext } from '../Context' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../css/Details.css' import '../css/Cart.css' export class Cart extends Component { static contextType = DataContext; render() { const { cart, increase, decrease, removeProduct } = this.context; if (cart.length === 0) {

No products

} return ( <> { cart.map(item => (

{item.title}

${item.price}

{item.description}

Color: {item.color}

{item.content}

{item.count}
removeProduct(item._id)}>X
)) }
Payment

Total: 0

) } } export default Cart
